title: The Prophets: Fortress Commentary on the Bible Study Edition
features: This concise commentary on the Prophets, excerpted from the
Fortress Commentary on the Bible: The Old Testament and Apocrypha

, engages readers in the work of biblical interpretation. Contributors from a rich diversity of perspectives connect historical-critical analysis with sensitivity to current theological, cultural, and interpretive issues.
Each chapter (Isaiah through Malachi) includes an introduction and commentary based on three lenses: ancient context, the interpretative tradition, and contemporary questions and challenges.
introduces fresh perspectives and draws students, preachers, and interested readers into the challenging work of interpretation.
